hooks.command: node -e "let d='';process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{try{const i=JSON.parse(d);const cmd=i.tool_input?.command||'';if(/git push.*main|git push -f|git push --force/.test(cmd)){process.stderr.write('[BLOCKED] No direct push to main. Use a feature branch and PR.');process.exit(2)}}catch{}})"
hooks.description: Block direct pushes to main and force pushes

hooks.command: node -e "let d='';process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{try{const i=JSON.parse(d);const f=i.tool_input?.file_path||'';if(f.includes('pi/hardware/')||f.includes('pi/config/pins')){process.stderr.write('[WARNING] Hardware file modified: '+f+'. Verify GPIO safety and cleanup.')}}catch{}})"
hooks.description: Warn when hardware-critical files are modified

hooks.command: echo '[Session checkpoint] Remember to update scratchpad.md and MEMORY.md if needed'
hooks.description: Remind to update working memory on session end
